typography.instructions: Import 'Manrope' and 'Inter' from Google Fonts. Use Manrope for all headings (h1-h6) and Inter for body text. Ensure high readability.

structure.card_style: bg-white shadow-sm border border-gray-100 rounded-lg hover:shadow-md transition-shadow

buttons.primary: bg-[#EA1D2C] hover:bg-[#C41623] text-white font-semibold rounded-full px-6 py-2 shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-gray-200 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 font-medium rounded-full px-6 py-2
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-red-50 text-[#EA1D2C] font-medium rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.default: bg-white rounded-xl border border-gray-100 shadow-sm p-6
cards.interactive: bg-white rounded-xl border border-gray-100 shadow-sm p-6 hover:border-red-100 hover:shadow-md cursor-pointer transition-all

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'Utensils', 'ShoppingBag', 'Bike', 'Store', 'BarChart3', 'Settings' for navigation.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE TAILWIND CONFIG: Add 'Manrope' and 'Inter' to font families. Extend colors with the 'iFood Red' (#EA1D2C).
2. UPDATE CSS VARIABLES: Replace the contents of 'src/index.css' with the provided CSS variables in the 'colors' section to establish the theme.
3. LAYOUT IMPLEMENTATION: Create a persistent SidebarLayout component. The sidebar should be white with red active states.
4. DASHBOARD WIDGETS: Build 'StatCard' components for the dashboard (Orders Today, Revenue, Pending, etc.). Use the 'Bento Grid' layout.
5. ORDER MANAGEMENT: Create a 'Kanban Board' or 'List View' for orders. Columns: New, Preparing, Ready, Out for Delivery, Delivered.
6. POLLING SIMULATION: Implement a visual indicator (e.g., a pulsing dot or progress bar) in the header to show the 'Polling' status (every 30s).
7. NOTIFICATIONS: Use 'sonner' for toast notifications when new orders arrive (simulated).
8. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all buttons and inputs have 'data-testid' attributes. Use semantic HTML.
9. MOCK DATA: Create a robust mock data generator for Orders and Items since there is no real backend yet.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Use generous padding (p-6, p-8).
Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Keep it clean and flat.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states.
